name: Draken (itch)
description:
Draken is a 2D platformer with challenging levels to test your skill, wit, and resolve. Each room holds a fun new challenge or puzzle to solve. Enjoy various levels and themes as you make your way through Draken! If you manage to succeed, try again to earn a higher rank! Challenge your friends to prove who is a true Draken master.

This game was made possible due to the incredible Unity 2D platformer tutorial series made by Pandemonium on Youtube! Check him out if you want to be able to make something similar. 

I'm new to game development but I'm definitely going to keep making games! This one is actually a prototype for a much more complete, unique, and fun mobile game I'm making. Stay tuned, and if you liked the game, feel free to support in any way you'd like. Thanks!
